alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Chattooga; Gordon; Murray; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 7:46PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Catoosa, Murray, Whitfield, eastern Walker, northwestern Gordon and northeastern Chattooga Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 745 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Graysville to near Suttles Mill, and moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dalton, Calhoun, Lafayette, Chatsworth, Ringgold, Fort Oglethorpe, Varnell, Eton, Tunnel Hill, Cohutta, Resaca, La Fayette, Center Post, Crandall, Sumac, Gregory, Blue Spring, Linwood, Beaverdale, and Villanow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Catoosa; Chattooga; Gordon; Murray; Walker; Whitfield
